hero.description.line1: We don't just draw strategies—we implement them as working systems.
hero.description.line2: From ad-tech business development to taxi signage hardware integration.
hero.description.line3: TechTalk has created 0→1 value from both technical and business perspectives.
hero.value.title: TechTalk's Value Proposition
hero.value.p1: TechTalk, Inc. is a company that implements solutions with a deep understanding of both technology and business. While many consulting firms focus on abstract value propositions like strategy formulation and technical advisory, TechTalk builds actual working systems.
hero.value.p2: CEO Coji Mizoguchi continues to write code today and takes responsibility for both management decisions and technical implementation. Experience from business development to launch is the source of comprehensive implementation capabilities.
services.section.label: OUR SERVICES
services.section.title: Four Service Areas
services.mvp.title: MVP Development & Architecture
services.mvp.description: Drawing from the experience of launching a taxi signage business with just two people, we provide implementation capabilities to build businesses with limited resources. From technology selection to architecture design, we support market entry with decisions that anticipate business growth.
services.mvp.item3: Design decisions aligned with business phase
services.data.title: Data Infrastructure & Analytics
services.data.description: Drawing from experience developing machine learning models as a data analyst for DSP bidding logic, we build data infrastructure that solves business challenges. Using DuckDB, dbt, and BigQuery to implement data utilization that supports decision-making.
services.data.item1: Data design directly tied to business challenges
services.ai.title: AI Integration & Strategy
services.ai.description: Making generative AI implementation decisions from both technology trends and business value perspectives. Using cutting-edge technologies like Vercel AI SDK to demonstrate AI value in actual working form. Providing everything from strategy to implementation.
services.leadership.title: Project Leadership & Advisory
services.leadership.description: From business development experience at FreakOut and executive experience at IRIS, providing judgments that understand both technology and business. Supporting critical project junctures including development management, technology selection, and marketing integration.
services.tech.label: CORE TECHNOLOGIES
profile.name: Coji Mizoguchi
profile.p1: Started career as an engineer at Dwango in 1999. After supporting Niconico's growth from the technical side, gained experience in both business development and data analysis at FreakOut.
profile.p2: In 2016, launched taxi signage business IRIS with two people, overseeing both management and implementation as Executive Vice President. Founded TechTalk in 2019 and continues to write code today.
profile.p3: Taking responsibility for both business decisions and technical implementation, providing speed of judgment and quality of execution at business launch phases and critical technical decision points.
profile.solo.title: Solo Corporation Advantage
profile.solo.description: Rather than large development teams, the CEO's direct involvement in all projects integrates business understanding with technical implementation. Delivering value from strategy to execution while maintaining speed of decision-making.

bio.title: Biography
bio.tagline: Creating 0→1 value from both technical and business perspectives
bio.social.title: CONNECT
bio.career.title: CAREER
bio.career.techtalk.title: TechTalk, Inc. - CEO
bio.career.techtalk.description: Providing technical implementation to multiple companies as a solo corporation. Continues implementing across a wide range of areas including chemical substance search systems, AI-leveraged MVPs, data pipelines, and marketing integration.
bio.career.iris.title: IRIS, Inc. - Executive Vice President
bio.career.iris.description: Launched taxi signage business with a team of two. Oversaw all aspects of business and technology, from business planning to executive-level management, including hardware, video advertising, and distribution system integration.
bio.career.freakout.title: FreakOut Holdings, Inc. (formerly FreakOut, Inc.)
bio.career.freakout.description: Engaged in technology-driven business development and alliances. Led the connection between business and technology as a data analyst in developing and analyzing machine learning models for DSP bidding logic.
bio.career.dwango.title: Dwango Co., Ltd. / Niwango, Inc.
bio.career.dwango.description: Started career as an engineer and programmer. Gained experience as engineering manager across multiple businesses including ringtone services, video services, and portal sites. Served as CTO at Niwango.
